titles: Several discourses viz., I. of purity and charity, II. of repentance, III. of seeking first the kingdom of God / by Hezekiah Burton ...
author: Burton, Hezekiah, 1631 or 2-1681.
publisher: Printed for Richard Chiswell, and sold by John Lawrence at the Angel in the Poultry, over against the Compter,
notes: Includes errata, p.[4] and advertisements, [3] p. at end.
